754260.name: Switch - Or Die Trying Demo
754260.description:
Demo version of Switch - Or Die Trying.

This was made during the Greenlight stage of development.

info*- the game was originally titled 'Switch' (as seen in this demo). We had to expand the name in the final version to differentiate ourselves from the console that was came before the full version of our game was released.

A few caveats regarding this Demo :

-Will provide a general feel of the game
-Contains limited levels
-Does not full reflect the final polish
-May contain bugs that have been addressed in the full version of the game
-Will not be updated

If you enjoyed the Demo please consider purchasing the full version of the game; every paid purchase counts.

And please do leave a Review.

Thank you.
